name: FUN and MOBILE
tagline: We build mobile apps in 2 weeks
description:
We are probably the fastest mobile apps development firms. We deliver any mobile app in 2-3 weeks. This is how it works:
1. After project kick-off, we built 90% of your app using Kinetise editor. In 1-2 days. You get a working prototype or rather a beta version.
2. Then we generate iOS and Android native source code.
3. We finish your project by manually coding what we couldn't build using Kinetise. 1-2 weeks for this part, depending on the project.
We are the creators of Kinetise platform, used by ING, acclaimed by TechCrunch and partnered by IBM. There are two advantages coming from this fact:
- we know the platform very well, we know how to implement even very complex features with it.
- team, who has created a platform like Kinetise, cannot be weak :)
